20110121150250.000|20110121150252.000|TR0|know, there were so many circumstances

20110121150259.000|20110121150301.000|TR0|of the things that saved me, I did have a 
20110121150301.000|20110121150304.000|TR0|rough time for several years when they

20110121150306.000|20110121150308.000|TR0|against people.

20110121150313.000|20110121150316.000|TR0|relaxed and, you know, a lot of guys that 
20110121150316.000|20110121150318.000|TR0|are either dead or in prison that I ran 
20110121150318.000|20110121150320.000|TR0|with during that time.  So I just got very

20110121150325.000|20110121150327.000|TR0|the life.

20110121150332.000|20110121150334.000|TR0|as ruthless and powerful as ever.  I mean, 
20110121150334.000|20110121150337.000|TR0|how ruthless were you?
20110121150337.000|20110121150339.000|TR0|
20110121150339.000|20110121150342.000|TR0|FRANZESE:  Well, you know, I got to tell 
20110121150342.000|20110121150344.000|TR0|you this, the feds say that but you know, 
20110121150344.000|20110121150346.000|TR0|over the past 25 years they have learned 
20110121150346.000|20110121150349.000|TR0|to use the laws that they've been given, 
20110121150349.000|20110121150351.000|TR0|the racketeering law, that they'll reform 
20110121150351.000|20110121150353.000|TR0|at.  They've used these laws very 
20110121150353.000|20110121150356.000|TR0|effectively to really develop so many 
20110121150356.000|20110121150358.000|TR0|informants on the street.  You I tell 
20110121150358.000|20110121150400.000|TR0|people back in my day, just before these 
20110121150400.000|20110121150403.000|TR0|laws came into effect, if you got 10 or 15 
20110121150403.000|20110121150405.000|TR0|years you made parole in seven or eight, 
20110121150405.000|20110121150408.000|TR0|any mob guy can do that.  You do that 
20110121150408.000|20110121150410.000|TR0|standing on your head.
20110121150410.000|20110121150412.000|TR0|
20110121150412.000|20110121150415.000|TR0|But today when you have a racketeering 
20110121150415.000|20110121150417.000|TR0|indictment that can go back to crimes that 
20110121150417.000|20110121150419.000|TR0|were committed 20, 25 years ago, you lock 
20110121150419.000|20110121150422.000|TR0|a guy up, and you say "hey, get 
20110121150422.000|20110121150424.000|TR0|comfortable, you're going to spend the 
20110121150424.000|20110121150426.000|TR0|rest of your life here unless you want to 
20110121150426.000|20110121150429.000|TR0|cooperate with us." That became a very, 
20110121150429.000|20110121150431.000|TR0|very powerful tool.  It's really the 
20110121150431.000|20110121150433.000|TR0|informants that have hurt the life.
20110121150433.000|20110121150436.000|TR0|
20110121150436.000|20110121150438.000|TR0|It's not so much the work of the feds, 
20110121150438.000|20110121150441.000|TR0|it's the laws they've had at their 
20110121150441.000|20110121150443.000|TR0|disposal that have really turned this 
20110121150443.000|20110121150445.000|TR0|thing around.  And you know, no matter how 
20110121150445.000|20110121150448.000|TR0|many wiretaps they have or anything else, 
20110121150448.000|20110121150450.000|TR0|the way you defeat this life is from 
20110121150450.000|20110121150452.000|TR0|within.  You got to develop informants 
20110121150452.000|20110121150455.000|TR0|from within.  The government has been 
20110121150455.000|20110121150457.000|TR0|effective in doing that based upon the 
20110121150457.000|20110121150459.000|TR0|laws that they have now.

20110121150521.000|20110121150523.000|TR0|everywhere they turn there's somebody 
20110121150523.000|20110121150525.000|TR0|there.  You know, again, I don't think 
20110121150525.000|20110121150528.000|TR0|people realized the arsenal of laws that 
20110121150528.000|20110121150530.000|TR0|government has at their disposal.  For 
20110121150530.000|20110121150533.000|TR0|some reason, there's a perception out 
20110121150533.000|20110121150535.000|TR0|there that they're not effective or that 
20110121150535.000|20110121150537.000|TR0|people get away with these crimes.
20110121150537.000|20110121150540.000|TR0|

20110121150542.000|20110121150544.000|TR0|anything.  I mean, they've got everything 
20110121150544.000|20110121150547.000|TR0|against them and the government has used 
20110121150547.000|20110121150549.000|TR0|it effectively.  And I'll tell you this, 
20110121150549.000|20110121150551.000|TR0|as ruthless, as powerful as ever, I don't 
20110121150551.000|20110121150554.000|TR0|believe so.  In the last 25 years the 
20110121150554.000|20110121150556.000|TR0|government has taken major control of the

20110121150726.000|20110121150728.000|TR0|sons were made.  So one of them has passed

20110121150731.000|20110121150733.000|TR0|know his family very well.  And you know, 
20110121150733.000|20110121150735.000|TR0|I still have guys there I would say.  I'm

20110121150747.000|20110121150750.000|TR0|PHILLIPS:  So bottom line, when you talk 
20110121150750.000|20110121150752.000|TR0|with your family members and you know who 
20110121150752.000|20110121150754.000|TR0|has been arrested now, do they feel, do 
20110121150754.000|20110121150757.000|TR0|you feel, that this bust is actually going 
20110121150757.000|20110121150759.000|TR0|to make a dent in mafia crime?
20110121150759.000|20110121150801.000|TR0|
20110121150801.000|20110121150804.000|TR0|FRANZESE:  Well, yes, because you know, 
20110121150804.000|20110121150806.000|TR0|you've got to understand. There's a big 
20110121150806.000|20110121150809.000|TR0|difference today with the people that are 
20110121150809.000|20110121150811.000|TR0|running that life.  They don't even have 
20110121150811.000|20110121150813.000|TR0|time to develop into effective leaders. 
20110121150813.000|20110121150816.000|TR0|You know, back in my day we had - I don't 
20110121150816.000|20110121150818.000|TR0|want to mention Gotti. Because she didn't 
20110121150818.000|20110121150820.000|TR0|do a great job, obviously, brought a lot 
20110121150820.000|20110121150823.000|TR0|of attention but guys like Joe Colombo and 
20110121150823.000|20110121150825.000|TR0|Carlo Gambino and even my dad at that 
20110121150825.000|20110121150827.000|TR0|time, Vincent Gigante, these men developed 
20110121150827.000|20110121150830.000|TR0|into real strong leaders and they were 
20110121150830.000|20110121150832.000|TR0|effective in leading their families in the 
20110121150832.000|20110121150835.000|TR0|right direction.
20110121150835.000|20110121150837.000|TR0|
20110121150837.000|20110121150839.000|TR0|Today these younger guys, they don't have 
20110121150839.000|20110121150842.000|TR0|experience.  They didn't grow up with that 
20110121150842.000|20110121150844.000|TR0|tradition and by the time - the minute 
20110121150844.000|20110121150846.000|TR0|they get in the life they're targeted.  
20110121150846.000|20110121150849.000|TR0|They don't have time to develop into 
20110121150849.000|20110121150851.000|TR0|effective leaders.  And I think that's a 
20110121150851.000|20110121150853.000|TR0|major, major problem. You know, to run a 
20110121150853.000|20110121150856.000|TR0|crime family and to be as effective as 
20110121150856.000|20110121150858.000|TR0|they have been over the past hundred 
20110121150858.000|20110121150900.000|TR0|years, because remember the mob, they 
20110121150900.000|20110121150903.000|TR0|prospered and they thrived on very 
20110121150903.000|20110121150905.000|TR0|difficult conditions, and that's all 
20110121150905.000|20110121150908.000|TR0|because of the leadership.
20110121150908.000|20110121150910.000|TR0|
20110121150910.000|20110121150912.000|TR0|You just don't have that today.  These 
20110121150912.000|20110121150915.000|TR0|young people cannot develop into effective 
20110121150915.000|20110121150917.000|TR0|leaders to run a crime family.  It's not
